about.title: Expert Renovation Services
about.description: Eder Contractor delivers premium renovation services across the Charleston region. We specialize in complete residential and light-commercial renovations, resurfacing, painting, mold remediation, fire damage renovation, and more. Our focus is on quality craftsmanship, clear communication, and reliable timelines.

renovation.title: Full Renovation
renovation.description: Complete residential and light-commercial renovations with comprehensive project coordination.

resurfacing.title: Resurfacing & Refinishing
resurfacing.description: Renew worn surfaces without full replacement: countertops, cabinets, and more.

painting.title: Interior & Exterior Painting
painting.description: Professional prep and finish for durable, even coats in all areas.

mold.title: Mold Remediation
mold.description: Assessment, containment, removal, and prevention for healthy indoor environment.

fire.title: Fire Damage Renovation
fire.description: Complete cleanup, odor removal, and structural renovation after fire incidents.

bathroom.title: Bathroom Remodeling
bathroom.description: Full bathroom transformations: tile, fixtures, lighting, and waterproofing.

deck.title: Deck Renovation
deck.description: Repair, sanding, staining, and refinishing of decks and exterior structures.

pressure.title: Pressure Washing
pressure.description: Driveways, siding, decks, patios - removing dirt, algae, and stains.

cabinet.title: Custom Cabinet Creation
cabinet.description: Design and build custom cabinetry tailored to your space and needs.

cabinetPaint.title: Cabinet Painting
cabinetPaint.description: Professional refinishing to refresh and modernize existing cabinets.

wallpaper.title: Wallpaper Install & Removal
wallpaper.description: Clean, precise installation and safe removal with proper wall prep.

commercial.title: Commercial Projects
commercial.description: Light commercial renovation and renovation services for businesses.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say About Us

review1.text: Eder Contractor did an amazing job on our bathroom remodel. The attention to detail was impressive, and they completed everything on schedule. Highly recommend!
review1.author: Sarah Mitchell

review2.text: Professional, reliable, and excellent work. They transformed our kitchen with cabinet refinishing and painting. The communication throughout was outstanding.
review2.author: Michael Johnson

review3.text: After fire damage, Eder Contractor renovated our home beautifully. They were compassionate and thorough, making a difficult time much easier.
review3.author: Jennifer Davis

review4.text: Great experience from start to finish. Our deck looks brand new after their renovation work. Quality craftsmanship at fair prices.
review4.author: Robert Thompson

review5.text: Excellent mold remediation service. They explained everything clearly and did a thorough job. Our home is safe and healthy again.
review5.author: Lisa Anderson

footer.description: Eder Contractor delivers premium renovation services across Goose Creek and Greater Charleston, SC. Quality craftsmanship, clear timelines, and reliable communication on every job.
